title: Model College Savings Plan (529)
description: Clients want to understand how much they need to save monthly for their child's future college education.

tasks.description: Gather inputs: child's current age, estimated college costs, and current savings.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary variables for the projection.

tasks.description: Use a 529 plan calculator to determine the required monthly contribution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the required savings amount based on the provided inputs.

tasks.description: Present the results and discuss opening a 529 savings account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the required savings goal and outlines the benefits of a 529 account.
